links: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1).
formula: For n >= 10, a(2n)-2n is 4-periodic with period [-7,-7,-5,-6] and a(2n+1) is 4-periodic with period [8,8,8,6]. - Benoit Cloitre, Jan 01 2013
author: _R. K. Guy_
